sampleDescriptions: We are advocating for the passage of H.R. 1947, The Religious Freedom Peace Tax Fund Act of 2017. This pertains to religious freedom and income tax payment. It is a First Amendment issue/legislation.
National Campaign for a Peace Tax Fund is lobbying for passage of legislation with respect to the First Amendment of the US Constitution pertaining to religious liberty and taxation.
National Campaign for a Peace Tax Fund is lobbying for legislation pertaining to the First Amendment of the US Constitution regarding religious liberty and taxation.
The National Campaign for a Peace Tax Fund has promoted H.R. 4169. It is a bill to expand the civil rights of conscientious objectors to war.
We are working to get the Religious Freedom Peace Tax Fund Act passed into law.
